summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Donovan Street, from 5th Avenue South to 8th Avenue South, by paving and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Majority Petition No. 115794 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
